lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He added that Brazil's economic program clearly demonstrates the intention to renegotiate the countries international financial committments, and added: "The domestic problems are our business."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Funaro, who spoke today to the International Monetary Fund's interim committee, was referring to talks he began Tuesday with creditor banks in New York in which unveiled Brazil's economic targets and financial needs.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "At this moment I am discussing something much more serious for Brazil and it's absolutely indispensible in a negotiation like this one that I dedicate myself entirely to the discussions," Funaro told reporters.
